00364       bool createdMdIntegratorFactory_;
00365 
00366       /*
00367       * Implementations of the explicit specializations of the public 
00368       * stress calculators computeVirialStress(T& ) etc. for T = double,
00369       * Util::Vector and Util::Tensor simply call these private method 
00370       * templates. This allows a single private template method to be 
00371       * used to compile the 3 relevant explicit specializations of each 
00372       * stress calculator, while allowing the template implementations 
00373       * to be defined in MdSystem.cpp, rather than in this header file. 
00374       */
00375 
00376       template <typename T>
00377       void computeKineticStressImpl(T& stress) const;
00378 
00379       template <typename T>
00380       void computeVirialStressImpl(T& stress) const;
00381
